doc:
Simon Paisley Day https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simon_Paisley_Day 0 Simon Paisley Day (born 13 April 1967), also credited as Simon Day, is a British stage and screen actor. His most recent work includes Timon of Athens (2008), Entertaining Mr Sloane (2009), Private Lives (2010), Twelfth Night (National Theatre, 2011), The Taming of the Shrew (Shakespeare's Globe, 2012) and portraying Sir Cosmo Duff Gordon in the 2012 ITV mini-series Titanic. Simon_Paisley_Day ( born 13_April_1967 ) , also_credited as Simon_Day , is a_British_stage_and_screen_actor . His_most_recent_work includes Timon of Athens_(_2008_) , Entertaining_Mr_Sloane_(_2009_) , Private_Lives ( 2010_) , Twelfth_Night_(_National_Theatre , 2011_) , The_Taming of the_Shrew_(_Shakespeare 's_Globe , 2012_) and portraying Sir_Cosmo_Duff_Gordon in the_2012_ITV_mini-series_Titanic .
